stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with Fax Theme Sent to Energy Sector Organization
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 19 September 2014, a phishing email was sent from secure@docs-mvm.com with the subject "Fax" to 139 users of an energy sector organization. The email contained a malicious link to http://al-katech.com/acztobqupi/cfhjhbmbzy.html.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
---- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ---- HLO docs-mvm.com MAIL FROM: RCPT TO:[REDACTED] DATA Received: from docs-mvm.com (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by docs-mvm.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 5596FDFC07 for [REDACTED]; Fri, 19 Sep 2014 03:03:08 +0200 (CEST) X-DKIM: OpenDKIM Filter v2.6.8 docs-mvm.com 5596FDFC07 DKIM-Signature: v=1; a=rsa-sha256; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=docs-mvm.com; s=mx; t=1411088588; bh=OEA1qOaHTiPI4Rh6kIzYKIfgjSAg38cvoYKzgFTHadE=; h=Date:From:To:Subject:From; b=IU1zSsWq4M4K/FtNgwiteqgx1SXESz3Z2PYZkXgg4y3HUFc4e+uKWw3vosTGcJZQm vMuoQeJLkaZCWmhbvmkTM/xm801dHDnjyKdZbquiywssihmvI6iESn+Di/o5Ig0JoV o3zCkC/JK1aUJ00vSRQqlYjm0zWIc0yJtRa4N3xg= MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=_148192376492" Date: Fri, 19 Sep 2014 03:03:07 +0200 From: secure@docs-mvm.com To: [REDACTED]; Subject: Fax Disposition-Notification-To: secure@docs-mvm.com Message-ID: X-Sender: secure@docs-mvm.com User-Agent: Roundcube Webmail/1.0.1 --=_148192376492 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Type: text/plain ---- END EMAIL HEADER ---- ---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ---- You have received a new fax. This fax was received by Fax Server. The fax has been downloaded to dropbox service (Google Inc). To view your fax message, please download from the link below. It's operated by Dropbox and safety. http://al-katech.com/acztobqupi/cfhjhbmbzy.html [1] http://al-katech.com/acztobqupi/cfhjhbmbzy.html --=_148192376492 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8

You have received a new fax. This fax was received by Fax Server.
The fax has been downloaded to dropbox service (Google Inc).

To view your fax message, please download from the link below. It's operated by Dropbox and safety.

http://al-katech.com/acztobqupi/cfhjhbmbzy.html

Received Fax Details
---------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------
Received on: 16/09/2014 08:14 AM
Number of Pages: 1
From (ID): 503-879-14819
Duration of Fax: 0:00:29
Transfer Speed: 4400

Received Status: Success
Number of Errors: 0
Port Received: NP_104
------------------------ ------------------------------------------------------------

This e-mail has been sent from an automated system.
PLEASE DO NOT REP. LY.

The information contained in this message may be privileged, confidential and protected from disclosure. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, or an employee or agent responsible for delivering this message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify your representative immediately and delete this message from your computer. Thank you.
--=_148192376492-- ---- END EMAIL BODY ---- The report stated this email was sent to 139 high-value individuals within the IT department of an energy sector organization. Those users included current and former employees. Some of the email address formats were correct, while others were guessed.

The malicious link to http://al-katech.com/acztobqupi/cfhjhbmbzy.html was the same one used for the reporting organization and a peer organization. The URL directory and .html page appeared to be auto-generated.
As of 30 October 2013, the domain al-katech.com resolved to IP 193.37.145.27.
